questions.question: The system whose transfer function is 1/s2(1+s). It comes under _____ type and _______ order.

explanations.a: Type is number of poles at origin and order is total number of poles

questions.question: Is the second order system classified based on the value of damping ratio?

explanations.a: high damping ratio has high damping effect
explanations.b: Lower damping ratio has less damping effect

questions.question: The reduction of steady state error depends on increasing the ________.
The closed loop poles of a critically damped system are _________.

answers.b: complex conjugate with negative real part
